titles.title: Private Relief for James Doyle Act
Private Relief for James Doyle Act
A bill for the relief of James Doyle, doing business as Rocky Mountain Ventures and Environmental Land Technologies, Ltd.
Private Relief for James Doyle Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Provides for the relief of James Doyle, doing business as Rocky Mountain Ventures and Environmental Land Technologies, Ltd.
